Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '13̣0̣' Name Pythodoros. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 062.28.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (228)
